slides.title: Cover
slides.text:
iBand — Get Signed / Connect
Powered by Fans. A Platform for Artists and Influencers.
slides.visual: Glowing logo center stage, purple-orange gradient, crowd silhouette.

slides.title: The Problem
slides.text: Fragmented creative apps; scouts waste time; fans lack a central interactive hub.
slides.visual: Broken notes, grayscale mic, scattered app icons.

slides.title: The Solution
slides.text: One global platform for music, dance, acting, modeling, fashion, influencers. Fans vote. Scouts get unrivalled talent without scheduling; instant comparisons.
slides.visual: App feed with vote buttons; talent tiles.

slides.title: Global Reach
slides.text: Multilingual worldwide with English as common global language. Genres grouped into global + country-specific categories. Fans can mix English/local/global — It's Always Your Choice.
slides.visual: World map with genre chips (K-Pop, Afrobeats, Flamenco).

slides.title: Models & Influencers
slides.text: Catwalk & Instagram models upload portfolios/reels. Agencies save interviews, no portfolio waiting, large side-by-side comparisons.
slides.visual: Catwalk clip + portfolio grid + brand badge.

slides.title: Fashion & Lifestyle
slides.text: Clothes/trainers/jewelry tagged in streams/posts. 'Buy the Look', drops, collabs, merch. AI shopping assistant.
slides.visual: Live frame with tappable item tags + product cards.
slides.prompt: Premium e-commerce overlay on live show.

slides.title: Engagement Flywheel
slides.text: Fans vote → ranking. Agencies/brands scout. Creators monetize. More fans join.

slides.title: Traction
slides.text: Backend/Frontend live; admin tools; specs for Dance/Studio/Portfolios/Fashion.

slides.title: Roadmap
phases: Phase 2: Studio collabs + battles + Fashion tags
Phase 3: Monetization (ads, marketplace, affiliate) + brand partnerships
Phase 4: Global scale, compliance, TV apps

slides.title: Closing
slides.text: iBand — Get Signed / Connect. For fans: It's Always Your Choice. Borderless, multilingual, culture-aware talent + commerce.
